com.se.simplicity.model
Interface VertexGroup

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayVG, IndexedArrayVG
public interface VertexGroup

A portion of (or possibly an entire) Model's vertices.

Author:
Gary Buyn

Method Summary
 VertexGroup createEdgeSubsetVG(int index)
           Creates a subset VertexGroup that contains only the edge at the given index within this VertexGroup.
 VertexGroup createFaceSubsetVG(int index)
           Creates a subset VertexGroup that contains only the face at the given index within this VertexGroup.
 VertexGroup createSubsetVG(int index, int length)
           Creates a subset VertexGroup that contains the given length of consecutive vertices starting at the given index within this VertexGroup.
 VertexGroup createVertexSubsetVG(int index)
           Creates a subset VertexGroup that contains only the vertex at the given index within this VertexGroup.
 VertexGroup getParent()
           Retrieves the parent of this VertexGroup.
 boolean isSubset()
           Determines if this VertexGroup is a subgroup of a parent VertexGroup.
 void mergeWithParent()
           Copies the changes made to this VertexGroup to it's parent VertexGroup.
 

Method Detail

createEdgeSubsetVG

VertexGroup createEdgeSubsetVG(int index)

Creates a subset VertexGroup that contains only the edge at the given index within this VertexGroup.

Parameters:
index - The index of the edge to create a subset VertexGroup for.
Returns:
A subset VertexGroup that contains only the edge at the given index within this VertexGroup.

createFaceSubsetVG

VertexGroup createFaceSubsetVG(int index)

Creates a subset VertexGroup that contains only the face at the given index within this VertexGroup.

Parameters:
index - The index of the face to create a subset VertexGroup for.
Returns:
A subset VertexGroup that contains only the face at the given index within this VertexGroup.

createVertexSubsetVG

VertexGroup createVertexSubsetVG(int index)

Creates a subset VertexGroup that contains only the vertex at the given index within this VertexGroup.

Parameters:
index - The index of the vertex to create a subset VertexGroup for.
Returns:
A subset VertexGroup that contains only the vertex at the given index within this VertexGroup.

createSubsetVG

VertexGroup createSubsetVG(int index,
                           int length)

Creates a subset VertexGroup that contains the given length of consecutive vertices starting at the given index within this VertexGroup.

Parameters:
index - The index of the first vertex to include in the subset VertexGroup.
length - The number of consecutive vertices to include in the subset VertexGroup.
Returns:
A subset VertexGroup that contains the given length of consecutive vertices starting at the given index within this VertexGroup.

getParent

VertexGroup getParent()

Retrieves the parent of this VertexGroup. The parent should be set to null unless this VertexGroup is a subset.

Returns:
The parent of this VertexGroup.

isSubset

boolean isSubset()

Determines if this VertexGroup is a subgroup of a parent VertexGroup.

Returns:
True if this VertexGroup is a subgroup of a parent VertexGroup, false otherwise.

mergeWithParent

void mergeWithParent()
                     throws SEInvalidOperationException

Copies the changes made to this VertexGroup to it's parent VertexGroup.

Throws:
SEInvalidOperationException - If this Vertex Group is not a subset.
